body: I think we should prefer `at::ArrayRef<ScalarType>`. It has an (implicit) constructor that takes initializer lists so call sites do not need to change.
body_html: I think we should prefer at::ArrayRef<ScalarType>. It has an (implicit) constructor that takes initializer lists so call sites do not need to change.
body_text: I think we should prefer at::ArrayRef<ScalarType>. It has an (implicit) constructor that takes initializer lists so call sites do not need to change.
